infotexts.entitydescription.deconstructorcrate: Big Ass Crate. Waterproof and can be used like any other crate
infotexts.entitydescription.masacrecrate: Or a big fucking fridge. Can hold more than 4 people!
infotexts.entitydescription.romaniancrate: Big fucking furniture crate. You can pack a whole apartment in it!
